document_data.mainbody:
Maid with Duster was a portrait painting created in or before the late 15 century DR.
The portrait depicted a young maid dressed in a frilly blue blouse and white kerchief. She was painted holding a feather duster as if the woman was presenting it proudly to the observer.The art is very clearly depicting a woman pulling and forming a yarn thread, not holing a feather duster.
thumb|The Maid With Duster painting in a frame.
In the , copies of the Maid with Duster painting were found in certain homes and establishments of the city of Baldurs Gate, the Western Heartlands, and within the ruined apothecary shop in the blighted village of Moonhaven.
